import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { eventsAPI } from '../services/api'; import { Event } from '../types'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/common/LoadingSpinner'; import { CalendarIcon, MapPinIcon, TicketIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { format } from 'date-fns'; const HomePage: React.FC = () => { const [events, setEvents] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const fetchEvents = async () => { try { const response = await eventsAPI.getAll({ limit: 6 }); if (response.success && response.data) { setEvents(response.data.data); } } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to fetch events:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchEvents(); }, []); return (

{event.image && ( )}

) : (

)}

); }; export default HomePage;
